titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to establish within the Enforcement Bureau of the Commission a division that specifically addresses the issue of robocalls, and for other purposes.
Regulatory Oversight Barring Obnoxious Calls and Texts Act of 2019
Regulatory Oversight Barring Obnoxious Calls and Texts Act of 2019
ROBO Calls and Texts Act
ROBO Calls and Texts Act
ROBO Calls and Texts Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
